Yggdrasil was quite taken by surprise when Condor replied.
Nonetheless, he answered.

Yggdrasil: Of course, soldier, go ahead. Just hold on, I'll be here soon.

With that, he went to where Condor lay and knelt.

Yggdrasil: What is it, Condor?

He knew these might be the Maximal's last words, even though he wished
the Matrix it would not be so.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Condor:
> 
> "Not... yet... Comander"said by comm link Condor "I'll be here... a 
> shot time more... can I ask you two favors, commander Yggdrasil?"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Yggdrasil closed his eyes as he sensed Condor pass away.
> > 
> > Yggdrasil: By Primus.... Get him boys, he killed Condor! I repeat
> > Flicker has killed Condor...
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Condor:
> > > 
> > > Shot that Conder received was fatal, his death was slowly and 
> > > painful. But the male didn't die before said something
> > > 
> > > "Anybody... Is there...?" said the males while he felt that his 
> life 
> > > was ending.
